body:
# Continue work on your form

Form: [% service#name %]

Use this link to sign in to your work:

[[% fqdn:return.signin.magiclink magiclink='{token}' %]]([% fqdn:return.signin.magiclink magiclink='{token}' %])

This link can be used only once and is valid for [% module.savereturn.config#emailTokenDuration %] hours.
subject: [% service#name %]: Your sign-in link
